description:
My hockey team is seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Director to join our team on a commission-based basis. As the Sales Director, you will be responsible for driving sponsorship revenue for our hockey team, with the goal of securing around $100,000 in sponsorships for the upcoming season.
• *Responsibilities:**

- Identify and prospect potential sponsors, including local businesses, corporations, and community organizations, to secure sponsorship agreements

- Develop and maintain relationships with key decision-makers and stakeholders at potential sponsor companies, effectively communicating the value proposition of sponsoring our hockey team.

- Create customized sponsorship proposals and presentations tailored to the needs and objectives of each potential sponsor, highlighting the benefits and opportunities for brand exposure, engagement, and activation.

- Negotiate sponsorship agreements and contracts, ensuring favorable terms and conditions for both parties.

- Collaborate with the marketing and operations teams to execute sponsorship activations and deliver on sponsor commitments, including signage, promotions, events, and other marketing initiatives.

- Track and report on sales performance, progress towards sponsorship goals, and ROI for sponsors.
• *Compensation:**

- Commission-Based: The Sales Director will receive a commission rate of 20% on all sponsorship revenue generated, with a target goal of $100,000 in total sponsorships for the season.

- Ticket Sales Bonus: In addition to commission, the Sales Director will receive a bonus of 10% of the team's total ticket sales revenue for the year, incentivizing the promotion and sale of game tickets to increase overall revenue.

- Additional Bonuses: Opportunities for additional bonuses will be available based on performance metrics, such as exceeding sales targets, securing high-value sponsorships, or achieving specific milestones.
• *Qualifications:**

- Proven track record of success in sales, with experience in sponsorship sales or sports marketing preferred.

- Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships and negotiate effectively with potential sponsors.

- Self-motivated and results-oriented, with the ability to work independently and drive revenue growth.

- Knowledge of the sports industry, particularly hockey, and a passion for sports marketing and sponsorship.

- Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines simultaneously.

- Must speak English fluently
• *How to Apply:**

If you are a motivated sales professional with a passion for sports and a track record of success in sponsorship sales, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are the ideal candidate for the Sales Director role

Additional Info:

Flexibility and Autonomy: the flexibility and autonomy of the role includes the freedom to choose working hours, location, and working arrangements. We value a work-life balance.

Support and Resources Available: there will be a $1000 budget available to help secure sponsorships

Opportunity for Growth: There is massive potential for growth and advancement within the organization, including opportunities to increase earnings, take on additional responsibilities, and contribute to the overall success of the hockey team.
